Sentencas: As an energy conversion and generation device that converts hydrogen energy into electrical energy, the solid oxide fuel cell is one of the most promising fuel cells.

Sentencas: However, thermal stability is the major reason for the shortened solid oxide fuel cell lifetime of hybrid electric vehicles usage.

Sentencas: In existing solid oxide fuel cell system, the peak temperature occurs in the afterburner, so the thermal safety assessment is very important for solid oxide fuel cell stack.

Sentencas: In this paper, afterburner thermal performance of natural gas solid oxide fuel cell system is studied based on computational fluid dynamics simulation.
